<S%G2419>"Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> who <S%G615>kills<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3036>stones<s%> those who are <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>her!<s%> How <S%G4212>often<s%> I would <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G1996>gathered<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1996>together,<s%> <S%G3739>even<s%> <S%G5158>as<s%> a <S%G3733>hen<s%> <S%G1996>gathers<s%> <S%G1438>her<s%> <S%G3556>chicks<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> her <S%G4420>wings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not!<s%>
